Trigger.name: prompt
Trigger.script: my.stats = matches[8] if matches[7] == "" then vampire = false else vampire = true end --vampire = (matches[7] ~= "") vitals.blood = tonumber(matches[7]) if string.find(matches[10], ": Critical") then enemy_health = "<red> 0-10%" elseif string.find(matches[10], ": Beaten") then enemy_health = "<red> 10-25%" elseif string.find(matches[10], ": Battered") then enemy_health = "<brown> 25-50%" elseif string.find(matches[10], ": Wounded") then enemy_health = "<orange> 50-80%" elseif string.find(matches[10], ": Hurt") then enemy_health = "<yellow> 80-95%" elseif string.find(matches[10], ": Scratched") then enemy_health = "<dark_green> 95-100%" elseif string.find(matches[10], ": Healthy") then enemy_health = "<green> 100%" elseif string.find(matches[10], ": Dead") then enemy_health = "<brown> UNDEAD" elseif string.find(matches[10], ": Cracking") then enemy_health = "<pink> 0-10%" elseif string.find(matches[10], ": Fading") then enemy_health = "<pink> 10-25%" elseif string.find(matches[10], ": Tiring") then enemy_health = "<magenta> 25-50%" elseif string.find(matches[10], ": Strong") then enemy_health = "<purple> 50-80%" elseif string.find(matches[10], ": Glowing") then enemy_health = "<midnight_blue> 80-95%" elseif string.find(matches[10], ": Shimmering") then enemy_health = "<blue> 95-100%" elseif string.find(matches[10], ": Scintillating") then enemy_health = "<cyan> 100%" else enemy_health = "" end deleteLine() prompt_function() if new_area then cecho("\n<green>Entering: "..gmcp.Room.Info.area) load_targets(gmcp.Room.Info.area) new_area = false prompt_function() end if new_room then waiting.ih = false send("who here", false) new_room = false end

Trigger.name: ih line
Trigger.script:
target_word = matches[2] target_number = matches[3] target_desc = matches[4] if target_word == "coins" then -- if balance.bal and not waiting.balance then -- send("get coins", false) -- else need_loot = true -- end end if not threatened then if (string.find(target_desc, "fighting (\w+)")) and (not string.find(target_desc, my.name)) and toggles.threatening then send("threaten "..target_number, false) targeted = false threatened = true have_target = false elseif string.find(target_desc, "fighting "..my.name) and target_word ~= "pumpkin" then if toggles.generics then target = target_word else target = target_number end targeted = true target_priority = -1 else for i in ipairs(possible_targets) do if ((target_type == "long") and string.find(target_desc, possible_targets[i])) or ((target_type == "short") and string.find(target_word, possible_targets[i])) then if not string.find(target_desc, "the corpse of") then if not targeted then if toggles.generics then target = target_word else target = target_number end targeted = true target_priority = i elseif i < target_priority then if toggles.generics then target = target_word else target = target_number end target_priority = i targeted = true end end end end end end
if possible_items ~= {} then for k in ipairs(possible_items) do if string.find(target_desc, possible_items[k]) then item_found = false for v in ipairs(gathering) do if gathering[v] == target_number then item_found = true end end if not item_found then table.insert(gathering, target_number) end end end end
--selectString(matches[1], 1) --setPopup("main", {[[start_bashing(target_number)]]}, {"Click to kill "..target_number})

Trigger.name: corpse
Trigger.script: corpse_word = matches[2] corpse_number = matches[3] corpse_desc = matches[4] corpse_found = false for i in ipairs(corpses) do if corpses[i] == corpse_number then corpse_found = true end end if not corpse_found then table.insert(corpses, corpse_word) end
